key_risks: Economic sensitivity to global manufacturing cycles
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to geopolitical tensions and semiconductor shortages
Intense competition leading to pricing pressures and margin erosion
controversies: Ongoing patent infringement litigation, including a recent case filed by AI-Core Technologies, LLC
Labor disputes, including a 2021 PAGA lawsuit in California
environmental_issues: Limited environmental disclosure and performance, not industry-leading
social_issues: Poor transparency regarding forced labor policies in its supply chain
Limited disclosure on human trafficking and forced labor risks
governance_issues: Potential labor compliance issues highlighted by past lawsuits
